self.name: help.TermsOfServiceUpdate
self.descriptionExcerpt: Update of Telegram's terms of service

nodes.name: help.termsOfServiceUpdateEmpty
nodes.description: No changes were made to telegram's terms of service

nodes.name: help.termsOfServiceUpdate
nodes.description: Info about an update of telegram's terms of service. If the terms of service are declined, then the account.deleteAccount method should be called with the reason "Decline ToS update"

nodes.name: help.getTermsOfServiceUpdate
nodes.description: Look for updates of telegram's terms of service
